import "./App.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; // import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import books from './data/books' import BookCard from './components/BookCard' import BookShelf from "./components/BookShelf"; import { get, getAll } from './BooksAPI' function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const bookId = 'yDtCuFHXbAYC&print'; const fetchData = async () => { const result = await get(bookId) const getAllBooks = await getAll() console.log("- getAllBooks", getAllBooks); console.log("- result", result); } fetchData() }, []) return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    { books.map(book => { if (book.state === 'Currently Reading') { return ( ) } }) } { books.map(book => { if (book.state === 'Want to Read') { return ( ) } }) }

    Want to Read

    1. 1776
      David McCullough
    2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
      J.K. Rowling

    Read

    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
